name: Rivermouths
role_in_state: estuarine trade, pilotage and salt production hub
culture_adjustments: strong river-clan patronage alongside harbour clans
oral pilot-charts emphasize tides and silt patterns over open-sea lore
augury rites focused on estuary tides and river-spirits
guild apprenticeship and harbour dues are stricter and more institutional
seasonal flood-festival replaces some open-coast ceremonial dates
constraints: scarce timber for large hulls; reliant on imported lumber
ritual auguries consume imported reagents and skilled labour; costly
limited arable hinterland; food imports required
notes: key node for State_14 maritime taxes and apprenticeship records
navigational auguries are legally regulated; pilots hold chart-knowledge monopoly
